overview: Dr.L. Lee Bosley (M.D) is the founder of Bosley Medical, a leading hair restoration expert in the United States. After carrying out his first hair restoration procedure in 1963, he sharpened his skills, and launched Bosley Medical, in 1974. Since then, he has performed more than 32,500 hair restoration procedures. He completed his B.S at the University of Nebraska, and received his MD degree from the University Of Nebraska College Of Medicine, at the age of 24. He also pursued an internship at Pierce County Hospital in Tacoma, Washington, and served in the U.S. Army Medical Corps, as a Captain, for six years. He has brought a revolutionary change in the field of hair restoration, with his skill, which has allowed the procedures results to seem original and natural. Dr. L. Lee Bosley owns the trademark rights for Micrograft, and The American Board of Dermatology honored him with the Certified Diplomate status, in 1964. He also served as the Clinical instructor in Dermatology at the University of California Medical Center, at San Francisco.
